name: Ainir the August
description:
You are Ainir the August, naturally you have a magically enchanted suit, granting you natural armour and magic resistance, however arrows easily slip between the cracks of your armour.

As well as this, you can create a ritual circle (36 candles ideally in a circle in a 6 block area).

In a ritual circle you can, place a coal block in the centre and use a bone to summon a wolf, you may summon two wolves.

If you place 2 coal blocks and stack them, then use the top block with a amethyst crystal you will summon a Lich-borne loyalist, you may only have one.
